Sentencas: In recent years, ammonia has gained traction as a clean fuel alternative and a promising energy carrier.
Titulo: Assessing the techno-economic viability of a trigeneration system integrating ammonia-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this study, a trigeneration system fuelled by ammonia has been conceptualised, integrating a solid oxide fuel cell stack for power generation, a hot water unit for heating, and an NH3-H2O absorption chiller for cooling.
Titulo: Assessing the techno-economic viability of a trigeneration system integrating ammonia-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The main objective of this study is to conduct a comprehensive techno-economic feasibility assessment of the proposed trigeneration system.
Titulo: Assessing the techno-economic viability of a trigeneration system integrating ammonia-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The system's performance was analysed for a UK supermarket requiring electricity, heating, and cooling.
Titulo: Assessing the techno-economic viability of a trigeneration system integrating ammonia-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A detailed sensitivity analysis was performed to investigate the influence of significant operating parameters, including current density, fuel utilisation factor, and cell temperature, on the system's performance.
Titulo: Assessing the techno-economic viability of a trigeneration system integrating ammonia-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The system can deliver maximum power, heating, and cooling outputs of 357.6 kW, 257.9 kW, and 46.99 kW, respectively.
Titulo: Assessing the techno-economic viability of a trigeneration system integrating ammonia-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The trigeneration system is projected to achieve its highest exergy efficiency at 60.94%, with a maximum fuel energy saving ratio of 47.67%.
Titulo: Assessing the techno-economic viability of a trigeneration system integrating ammonia-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The lowest levelised cost of energy (LCOE) is estimated to be 0.1232 pound per kWh.
Titulo: Assessing the techno-economic viability of a trigeneration system integrating ammonia-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This study's objective is also aligned with United Nations Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) No. 7, which aims to achieve Affordable and Clean Energy.
Titulo: Assessing the techno-economic viability of a trigeneration system integrating ammonia-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell
